targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  thermocouple_temperature
FROM maxchipdata
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  data_pin = 23 AND
  reference_juntion_temperature != 0 AND
  thermocouple_temperature != 0
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  thermocouple_temperature
FROM maxchipdata
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  data_pin = 26 AND
  reference_juntion_temperature != 0 AND
  thermocouple_temperature != 0

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  data_value
FROM sensordata
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  avg(thermocouple_temperature) AS "thermocouple_temperature"
FROM maxchipdata
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  data_pin = 4 AND
  reference_juntion_temperature != 0 AND
  thermocouple_temperature != 0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
